0.text:
Innate: Viktor can augment each of his basic abilities at the cost of the maximum 100 Hex Fragments, he obtains them by killing enemies:
 Minions and  monsters generate 1 Hex Fragment.
Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 Hex Fragments.
Enemy  champion  takedowns generate 25 Hex Fragments.
0.html:
Innate: Viktor can augment each of his basic abilities at the cost of the maximum 100 Hex Fragments, he obtains them by killing enemies:

  • Minions and monsters generate 1 Hex Fragment.
  • Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 Hex Fragments.
  • Enemy champion takedowns generate 25 Hex Fragments.
markedPassages: Minions
monsters
champion
takedowns

1.text: Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.
1.html: Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.
markedPassages: Chaos Storm

0.text: Active: Viktor throws a device at the target enemy that deals magic damage. He also  shields himself for 27 − 105 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Viktor throws a device at the target enemy that deals magic damage. He also shields himself for 27 − 105 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shields

1.text: Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack is empowered to become  non-projectile and deal modified magic damage.
1.html: Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack is empowered to become non-projectile and deal modified magic damage.
markedPassages: non-projectile

2.text: Augment: Turbocharge: After the device hits, Viktor gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to 48 − 184 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
2.html: Augment: Turbocharge: After the device hits, Viktor gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to 48 − 184 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
markedPassages: Augment: Turbocharge
30% bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Viktor deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a 0.75-second delay, it activates to  slow enemies within, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
0.html: Active: Viktor deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a 0.75-second delay, it activates to slow enemies within, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
markedPassages: slow

1.text: The field inflicts a stack to enemies within every 0.5 seconds, the third stack consumes them all to  knock down and  stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravity Field, occurring once per cast.
1.html: The field inflicts a stack to enemies within every 0.5 seconds, the third stack consumes them all to knock down and stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravity Field, occurring once per cast.
markedPassages: knock down
stun

2.text: Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding  Chaos Storm's persistent damage,  slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
2.html: Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding Chaos Storm's persistent damage, slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
markedPassages: Augment: Magnetize
Chaos Storm's
slow

0.text: Active: Viktor fires an energy beam along the target path that deals magic damage to enemies hit and briefly grants  sight of the area.
0.html: Active: Viktor fires an energy beam along the target path that deals magic damage to enemies hit and briefly grants sight of the area.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Augment: Aftershock: The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage to enemies hit.
1.html: Augment: Aftershock: The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: Augment: Aftershock
Aftershock

0.text:
Active: Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  disrupting their  channeled abilities.
The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within it every second and granting  sight of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor.
0.html:
Active: Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and disrupting their channeled abilities.
The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within it every second and granting sight of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor.
markedPassages: disrupting
channeled abilities
sight

1.text: Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
1.html: Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.

2.text: Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.
2.html: Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.

3.text: Augment: Perfect Storm: The singularity moves 25% faster.
3.html: Augment: Perfect Storm: The singularity moves 25% faster.
markedPassages: Augment: Perfect Storm

4.text: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
